description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Sponge Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut Sponge Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut cake into 3 equal pieces (20x10cm each). Place 1 piece onto a serving plate. Spread with half of the curd and top with 1/3 of the cream. Repeat layering once more. Top with remaining cake piece, remaining cream and mango. Serve.

Cut cake into 3 equal pieces (20x10cm each). Place 1 piece onto a serving plate. Spread with half of the curd and top with 1/3 of the cream. Repeat layering once more. Top with remaining cake piece, remaining cream and mango. Serve.

Cut cake into 3 equal pieces (20x10cm each). Place 1 piece onto a serving plate. Spread with half of the curd and top with 1/3 of the cream. Repeat layering once more. Top with remaining cake piece, remaining cream and mango. Serve.
